description.0: A trophy made from gemstones from the Collective of Plenty and crystals from the Flower-Feather Clan. It is said to have once belonged to a legendary wrestler.

0.0: ATK is increased by <cryo>28%</cryo>. When you use a Plunging Attack, you will gain the "Dawn's First Hue" effect: Plunging Attack CRIT DMG is increased by <cryo>28%</cryo>. When you use an Elemental Skill or Burst, you will gain the "Twilight's Splendor" effect: Plunging Attack CRIT DMG is increased by <cryo>40%</cryo>. The two effects above each last for 15s, and will be canceled 0.1s after the ground impact hits a target.
